name: Mr. & Mrs. Fish
description:
In the movie, Mr. & Mrs. Smith received the same secret mission-killing Benjamin, which actually was a trap with hazards lurking ahead. Now, after 10 years, Mr. & Mrs. Fish are also threatened by Ben-jellyfish. This time, they choose to stand shoulder to shoulder, to avoid the killers’ attack and to snatch bounty earthworms.

Now, their fate rests in your hands, so you must know the rules well. Here go the Rules:
- Hold left to keep Mr. Fish stay left
- Hold right to keep Mrs. Fish stay right
- Release to make them back to middle lanes.
Remember, avoid those killer jellyfish, and catch every earthworm.

Go ahead and start the journey!
